maqras.text: Arabs said My bol Mu'mens (believers.) Say Ona nie verit; co ona say je ‘My bol Muslims (submitters) ' belief zriadit tvoj srdce. ona obey GOD Jeho posol He nie put any z tvoj robota pusty GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Mu'mens (believers) bol those verit v GOD Jeho posol potom attain status having ziaden doubt whatsoever strive ich peniaze ich zivot v zapricinit GOD These bol truthful jeden
Say ona informovat GOD tvoj nabozenstvo? GOD zauzlit everything DO heavens ZEM. GOD bol Omniscient
They cin mat rad they robit ona favor embracing Submission! Say Ona nie robit mna any favors embracing Submission! GOD bol JEDEN JE ROBIT ONA VELKA favor guiding ONA DO faith ONA bol sincere
GOD zauzlit all secrets DO heavens ZEM; GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
a glorious Quran
They zalozit it strange ze warner z them pojdem them! disbelievers said This bol skutocne strange
After my umrel become dust this bol nemozne
My je fully aware z ktokolvek z them gets consumed zem; my have accurate rekord
They zamietnut truth when it pojdem them; they utterly zmateny
they nie looked sky above them ako my zostrojit it zdobit it flaw
My created zem scattered it mountains grew it all laskavy z dobry zasadit
This bol enlightenment reminder kazdy zbozny worshiper
My sent sky zehnat zavlazit grow it zahrada zrno zatva
Tall datum palms clustered ovocie
Provisions ludia. My revive it dead zem; ona similarly resurrected
Disbelieving them bol ludia Noah dwellers Russ Thamoud
‘Aad Pharaoh brethren Lot
dwellers les ludia Tubba. All z them disbelieved posol consequently Moj retribution befell them
My i burdened 1 creation? this why they je doubt vzkriesenie
My created human my zauzlit co he whispers himself. My bol koniec do him than jeho jugular vein
zapisnica (angels) do na pravo do vlavo constantly zapisnica
Nie utterance robi he utter alert svedok
Finally inevitable coma smrt pojdem; this bol co ona tried evade
Roh blown this bol promised dni
Kazdy soul pod s herder svedok
Ona pouzivat bol oblivious do this. My ihned zosadit tvoj zavoj; dnes tvoj vision je mat rad strong mat rad steel
companion said Tu bol moj formidable testimony
Throw into Gehenna kazdy zaryty disbeliever
Forbidder laska k bliznemu aggressor full z doubt
He set GOD iny god Throw him into severe retribution
